mapper.sql: auth_id, auth_type, auth_param1, auth_param2, encrypt_type, encrypt_param1, encrypt_param2, valid_flag, created_date, created_user, updated_date, updated_user
mapper.select:
select
from t_auth_encrypt where auth_id = #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND valid_flag = 1
mapper.update: update t_auth_encrypt set valid_flag = 0 where auth_id = #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND valid_flag = 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_auth_encrypt (auth_id, auth_type, auth_param1, auth_param2, encrypt_type, encrypt_param1, encrypt_param2, valid_flag, created_date, created_user, updated_date, updated_user ) values (#{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authParam1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authParam2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encryptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encryptParam1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encryptParam2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

auth_type = #{authType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_auth_encrypt set auth_type = #{authType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_param1 = #{authParam1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_param2 = #{authParam2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, encrypt_type = #{encryptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, encrypt_param1 = #{encryptParam1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, encrypt_param2 = #{encryptParam2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_flag = #{validFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_user = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where auth_id = #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_auth_encrypt t WHERE t.auth_id IN ( SELECT t1.auth_id FROM t_project t1 WHERE t1.auth_id = t.auth_id AND t1.data_source_id IN ( SELECT t2.data_source_id FROM t_data_source t2 WHERE t2.app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t2.valid_flag = 1 ) AND t1.valid_flag = 1 ) AND t.valid_flag = 1;
